content: little known fact snails are total party animals have you ever wondered why snails only come out at night it s because they are out there raging then they have to sleep all day because they were out partying all night the inside of a snail s shell is filled with disco balls confetti and cake find the full free pattern on the tiny curl website https //www tinycurl co/party-snail-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/
